org.hazelwire.xml
Class ConfigGenerator

java.lang.Object
  org.hazelwire.xml.ConfigGenerator

public class ConfigGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

This class generates the configfiles that will be used by the deployscripts in the virtualmachines. This is where the options come into play since the system itself doesn't use the options except for allowing the user to set them. After they are set and the virtualmachine is generating they are placed on the server in a location where the module deployscript can reach them. After that it's the responsibility of the deployscript to handle the options.

Author:
Tim Strijdhorst
